value: After that､ the detective drama filming proceeded well. They safely finished filming.
Congratulations on finishing filming!
joy
Fufu､ thank you ♪ Thanks for your hard work with lots of other things too､ my cute Producer.
nomal
Oh､ what is it､ Hakutsuru-chan? You look like you have something to say to me.
…Nah. I sure was shocked. I’ve been watching you close up. You really upped your skills.
sad
W-what’s that? You’re especially honest today. Are pigs going to start flying tomorrow､ or what?
At least accept the occasional compliment at face value. I’m never saying it again､ you hear!
nomal
When I heard you changed jobs to become an idol… Honestly､ I was just disappointed.
Though I’m not saying I’d understand how you felt… about not getting rewarded… not getting acknowledged…
I thought you’d just up and run away. “Oh､ so you were that kind of weak-kneed bastard…” and whatever.
But it looks like you really weren’t running away. In fact､ you were actually moving forward､ dammit.
joy
…Hahah. A little too late for you to be saying that､ don’t you think? Isn’t that obvious?
normal
My nature hasn’t changed a bit､ nor has it weakened. My environment’s taken a huge 180…
angry
But even now､ I’m going to keep on walking so that I can shine in the center of the stage. It’s always been this way since the past and even now.
I see… Being able to act with you was fun. I hope we have a chance to do it again sometime.
joy
Oh dear. Then I might just be the protagonist then､ hmm? ♪
angry
I don’t know when it’ll happen､ but until then､ let’s keep polishing our respective forms of entertainment!
